text: Peg Phillips (September 20, 1918 - November 7, 2002) was an American actress. She is best known for playing storekeeper Ruth-Anne Miller on the television series Northern Exposure. Phillips was born in Everett, Washington. Phillips died from lung disease in Seattle, Washington, aged 84. ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:People from Everett, Washington
title: Peg Phillips
